title: Inside the fight to end hunger in Massachusetts and beyond
dc:creator: WBUR
description: We hear from Congressman Jim McGovern, who helped organize the second White House Conference on Food, Nutrition and Health. We also speak with folks from the Greater Boston Food Bank and Cambridge's PAGU restaurant on what efforts look like on the ground.
itunes:author: WBUR
